mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.sell_point, a.price, a.image, b. NAME category_name FROM tb_item a LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat b ON a.cid = b.id WHERE a.`status` = 1

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.sell_point, a.price, a.image, b. NAME category_name, c.item_desc FROM tb_item a JOIN tb_item_cat b ON a.cid = b.id JOIN tb_item_desc c ON a.id = c.item_id WHERE a.status = 1 AND a.id=#{itemId}
